attributes.action: Give Ross Brawn of Brawn GP Team a Knighthood for his outstanding contribution to Britain and Motorsport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recognition of the outstanding contributions to numerous levels and Teams in motorsport throughout his career and in recognition of his leadership,innovation, team building and excellent motivational and people managagement skills.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
